fields.summary: Bump netty to 4.1.127 due to CVE-2025-58057
fields.description:
https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-58057

fixed in 4.1.125 but no harm upgrading to latest

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved
